channel.title: Need Help with getting my server online (Hosting off laptop)
channel.description: Alright so i portfowarded, got no-ip DUC, got no-ip, opened firewall and allowed Port 43594. (btw i portfowarded a D link router Model DIR625) for a laptop. Now people under my internet connection can get in using my computers ip,not the ip from whatsmyip.com, but no1 outside of my internet connection. Would any1 know if i have to do something on my laptop to make it so people outside my internet connection can connect onto my server?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2008, 10:46:58 PM[/size][hr]Anyone know whats wrong??

item.title: Need Help with getting my server online (Hosting off laptop)
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

Alright so i portfowarded, got no-ip DUC, got no-ip, opened firewall and allowed Port 43594. (btw i portfowarded a D link router Model DIR625) for a laptop. Now people under my internet connection can get in using my computers ip,not the ip from whatsmyip.com, but no1 outside of my internet connection. Would any1 know if i have to do something on my laptop to make it so people outside my internet connection can connect onto my server?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2008, 10:46:58 PM[/size][hr]Anyone know whats wrong??
